casebody.data:
DOOLITTLE
v.
GEORGE, et al. 195P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 16, 2017 Natalia K. Isenberg, Attorney at Law, Bryan T. Simpson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for George, Robert M. Paul A. Tharp, Attorney at Law, Matthew R. Arnold, Attorney at Law, J. Bradley Smith, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Doolittle, Chelsea. Patrick H. Flanagan, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Sipe, Vidal A., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2017 by Defendant (Robert M. George) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of June 2017."
